name: American Sign Language I
subject: LOTE
description: Introductory course on receptive/expressive signs, non-manual communication, grammar features in everyday contexts.

name: American Sign Language II
subject: LOTE
description: Builds on ASL I skills, develops signing for various everyday situations, explores deaf community cultural perspective.

name: American Sign Language II (Advanced)
subject: LOTE
description: Expands on ASL I skills to a higher proficiency level (Intermediate-Mid to High) across communication modes, further explores deaf culture.

name: American Sign Language III
subject: LOTE
description: Continues emphasis on communication from Levels I/II, learning structures/vocabulary for social interaction and daily living.

name: American Sign Language III (Advanced)
subject: LOTE
description: Advanced development from ASL II, reaching higher proficiency (Intermediate-Mid to High) and exploring deaf culture.

name: American Sign Language IV
subject: LOTE
description: Extends beyond ASL III for intermediate level communication, using knowledge of language, grammar, culture.

name: American Sign Language IV (Advanced)
subject: LOTE
description: Advanced development from ASL III, reaching higher proficiency (Intermediate-Mid to High) and exploring deaf culture.

name: Seminar in LOTE, Advanced ASL
subject: LOTE
description: Focuses on specialized area of study (e.g., author, genre, topic) using target language for various audiences/purposes.

name: Chinese I (Mandarin)
subject: LOTE
description: Introduces basic Mandarin skills (listening, speaking, reading, writing) across communication modes; everyday expressions.

name: Chinese II (Mandarin)
subject: LOTE
description: Reviews Level I concepts, continues with additional structures/vocabulary to increase Mandarin proficiency.

name: Chinese II (Mandarin) (Advanced)
subject: LOTE
description: Advanced Mandarin study with greater depth/range than Level II, working toward higher proficiency.

name: Chinese III (Mandarin)
subject: LOTE
description: Extends basic Mandarin program, emphasizes increasing proficiency in reading, writing, speaking, listening.

name: Chinese III (Mandarin) (Advanced)
subject: LOTE
description: Reviews/advances Mandarin structures; develops reading/writing skills via study/analysis of authentic texts.

name: Chinese IV (Mandarin)
subject: LOTE
description: Extends beyond Level III Mandarin program, increasing oral/written proficiency, emphasizes culture.

name: Chinese IV (Mandarin) (Advanced)
subject: LOTE
description: Advanced extension beyond Level III Mandarin program, increasing oral/written proficiency, emphasizes culture.

name: Chinese (Mandarin) AP Language and Culture
subject: LOTE
description: AP Level: Stresses necessary skills for sophisticated active communication in Mandarin, emphasizes Chinese culture.

name: Seminar in LOTE, Advanced Chinese (Mandarin)
subject: LOTE
description: Focuses on specialized area of study (e.g., author, genre, topic) in Mandarin for various audiences/purposes.

name: French I
subject: LOTE
description: Introduces basic French skills (listening, speaking, reading, writing) across communication modes; everyday expressions.

name: French II
subject: LOTE
description: Reviews Level I concepts, continues with additional structures/vocabulary to increase French proficiency.

name: French II (Advanced)
subject: LOTE
description: Advanced French study with greater depth/range than Level II, working toward higher proficiency.

name: French III
subject: LOTE
description: Extends basic French program, emphasizes increasing proficiency in reading, writing, speaking, listening.

name: French III (Advanced)
subject: LOTE
description: Reviews/advances French structures; develops reading/writing skills via study/analysis of relevant authentic texts.

name: French IV
subject: LOTE
description: Extends beyond Level III French program, increasing oral/written proficiency, emphasizes culture.

name: French IV (Advanced)
subject: LOTE
description: Advanced extension beyond Level III French program, increasing oral/written proficiency, emphasizes culture.

name: French AP Language and Culture
subject: LOTE
description: AP Level: Stresses necessary skills for sophisticated active communication in French, emphasizes francophone culture.

name: French V (Advanced)
subject: LOTE
description: Reinforces active communication skills, building on French IV. Emphasizes francophone culture.

name: Seminar in LOTE, Advanced French
subject: LOTE
description: Focuses on specialized area of study (e.g., author, genre, topic) in French for various audiences/purposes.

subject: LOTE

name: Spanish AP Literature and Culture
subject: LOTE
description: AP Level: Exposure to literary history of Spain/Latin America; analysis within cultural, historical, literary context.

name: Seminar in LOTE, Advanced Spanish
subject: LOTE
description: Focuses on specialized area of study (e.g., author, genre, topic) in Spanish for various audiences/purposes.

name: Spanish for Healthcare Providers
subject: LOTE Elective
description: Provides instruction in terminology to communicate in Spanish in healthcare settings using culturally appropriate language. Elective credit, does not fulfill LOTE grad req.

name: Special Topics in Language and Culture
subject: LOTE
description: Online course to substitute for Level II LOTE requirement for students unlikely to succeed in standard Level II. Admin approval needed.
